channel.title: Newsletters on Tridactyl - a vim-like Firefox WebExtension
channel.description: Recent content in Newsletters on Tridactyl - a vim-like Firefox WebExtension

item.title: Winter 2020
item.description: Hello, Welcome to the second quarterly Tridactyl newsletter. Since the last newsletter, we resolved our dispute with the Mozilla add-on reviewers and have been relisted on the AMO. If you like graphs, you can clearly see our time in the wilderness where the AMO did not collect statistics for us here: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/tridactyl-vim/statistics/?last=365 We've recently added quite a few long-demanded features to the Tridactyl beta, which we'll enumerate in the following paragraphs.

item.title: Autumn 2019
item.description: Hi! It's been an eventful few months for Tridactyl. We were delisted from the AMO and have been slowly trying to get listed again. We're currently waiting to hear back from a reviewer on a query of ours before we submit what we will hope be our final revision which will be accepted. To have a hope of being relisted we have had to do some stuff we didn't want to do, namely editing user.
